name: Dpto amoblado centro historico
description:
The space
FURNISHED APARTMENT STEPS FROM SANTIAGO HISTORICAL CENTER!

The apartment is located in a privileged area of Santiago, close to the historic center, just steps from the Metropolitan Park (Cerro San Cristobal), steps from Bellavista (where you find theaters, bars, restaurants and a house - museum of Pablo Neruda) and subway.

INCREDIBLE VIEWS! Building with barbecue, pool, gym, 24 hour concierge. Modern Department. The building has a BBQ area and a rooftop pool with panoramic views of Santiago.

And with BICYCLES for tourists!

The apartment has all the necessary amenities to make your stay pleasant to the city of Santiago. The furnished kitchen (refrigerator, microwave, bar for a drink or eat, cooking utensils, kettle, gas stove), living room with sofa bed. These are the common areas.

The double bed room with TV, en suite bathroom, terrace with table and chairs to enjoy the view of the city.
host_about:
Me gusta el deporte y la vida al aire libre (bike, sky, camping). Idiomas, español, ingles. Países visitados: Argentina, Perú, Bolivia, Colombia, Brasil, Usa, Canada, China.  En relación a Chile, puedo aconsejar visitar:
Santiago, es la capital, es una ciudad moderna, mucha vida nocturna, restoranes, parques, y como toda metropolis tener los cuidados normales con las pertenencias, no existe delincuencia mas que en otros paises. Otros lugares que son iconos para visitar, Isla de pascua, torres del paine (al sur del mundo, es un parque increible donde puedes ver glaciares milenarios, bosques, rios  y lagunas), Viña del mar/ Valparaiso, San Pedro de Atacama ( pueblo ubicado en el desierto mas arido del mundo).

host_about:
Dear Guest
I am Hector Medina, Chief Manager of HecTour and Specialist of Bilingual Tour, Transfer & Accommodation Services. 
My studies are based on business administration.  I had the opportunity to improve my English studies in USA and my French at the Institute of French Alliance of Viña del Mar city.  Upon returning to my land I realized that my vocation was on the tourist side. It is really what I love to do. 
Since 2004 I have formed a group of local tour guides and drivers very knowledgeable in the areas where we live. 
Our main concern is to provide a unique travel experience to each client by making them experiment, a bit of culture, food, landscapes of our country from an interesting perspective. 
As a "PRIVATE, PERSONALIZED & FLEXIBLE” service, our guests have the opportunity to know or visit what they are really interested in modern, clean and comfortable vehicles. 
We affirm you that we are totally responsible for your happiness and safety while you are in our care. 
Our role is critical in the satisfaction of your tour and/or in your business needs. We are passionate and well knowledgeable on every tour and information we provide. 
After reading these sincere words, we hope to walk together in this beautiful Land of Enchantment. 
It will be a real pleasure to have you, family and friends as a "VERY SPECIAL CLIENT".

description:
The space
Great and luminous apartment located in Providencia, Santiago de Chile.
We rent one of our bedrooms, one bed twin size.
Quiet, near to subway, swimming pool (only summer), gymnasium, parking.
Happily welcomed travelers from around the world.


Providencia includes Barrio Suecia, an area filled with pubs and nightclubs, and Barrio Bellavista, a bohemian area populated with artists and performers. The latter lies in the shadow of Cerro San Cristóbal, a prominent hill in the city topped by a 22 m statue of The Virgin Mary. The north of Providencia is its financial and commercial district (centered on Providencia Ave., a major shopping street), while the remainder of it contains high-priced residential development.

Other notable areas of interest in Providencia include the Metropolitan Zoo, the Teleférico (an aerial gondola that transports people from the foot of Pedro de Valdivia Avenue to the top of San Cristóbal Hil

host_about:
Hola... espero tengas un poco de tiempo para una descripción sencilla...
Me presento soy Edwin, me gusta vivir el día a día... soy ingeniero que dedica su tiempo a su trabajo, al gimnasio y a las clases de salsa y bachata (esto ultimo me encanta)... de vez en cuando salgo con mis amigos a unos buenos bares que quedan muy cerca, soy muy amigable y me gusta compartir con muchas personas.
Actualmente vivo solo... disfruto de mi soltería y aprovecho de salir y viajar cuando tengo la oportunidad, disfruto mucho viendo peliculas sobre todo en el cine, me gusta la cocina donde puedo preparar muchas cosas sabrosas.
Si decides venir, no dudaras en volver ya que disfrutaremos de muchos lugares o te recomendare lugares que no olvidaras.
Espero que estas palabras te ayuden a conocerme mejor.
Edwin.

The space
I am an independant artist and teacher who loves to host people from all around the world.I love cats and dogs and they are welcome too.!!
My place is one block away the metro,and it is located in a traditional and nice residential neighborhood in Santiago,close to parks and cafés: Providencia. The building is off a big and nice park where you can jog,walk,byke around or simply relax reading the morning news.
I speak Spanish, Italian and English and understand French.

Providencia is a trendy, safe neighborhood, ideally located between the center (la Moneda) and Las Condes (el Golf and Tobalaba). My flat is one block from metro Bilbao and walking distance from tons of bars and great places to eat. It's a short cab ride from Bellavista, known for its great restaurants and lively nightlife.

Rates are $70 for the first 1-2 person and an additional $25 for extra guests

Guest access
The wifi internet and all basic utilities (electricity, gas, hot water) are included in the price. Set of towels and linens are provided.
The building has laundry, security guards and 24 hour concierge.

Other things to note
On arrival more information on these and other attractions, as well as suggestions of restaurants located less than 10 minutes away from the apartment is delivered.
neighborhood_overview: The building is located on a pedestrian mall, and located just 100 meters from Santa Ana subway station and a supermarket.

name: Santiago Down Tow Big appartment
description:
The space
De profesión Ingeniero Civil, trabajo en una Filial de CODELCO Chile en Innovación Tecnológica de Minería y Metalurgia. Tengo 36 años, soy soltero. Disfruto mucho del Cine, pescar, buena cocina, actividades al aire libre. Tengo un Perro (Mara) de raza Maltes Bichon, muy chica, amistosa, no ladra ni muerde. Días Sábado y Domingo duermo hasta tarde (12:00) no me vas a sentir. Soy silencioso, aunque soy fumador solo lo hago en el balcón. Hablo Español, Ingles. Hablo un poco de Ruso y Alemán.

Edificio Céntrico (Santiago Centro), Nuevo (8 Años), departamento con terminaciones de lujo. description:
One bedroom apartment, fully furnished with everything you need to make your stay very good, terrace on the 20th floor with great view of Santiago. The location is perfect, walking distance to the city's highlights and subway. Places of interest: Central Market, Barrio Bellas Artes, Bellavista and Lastraría, Estación Mapocho, Parque Forestal, Cerro Santa Lucia and San Cristobal, La Vega Central, etc. My accommodation is good for couples, adventurers and business travelers.

host_about:
Hola amig@s y comunidad de Airbnb!

Soy Daniela, al igual que tú, me encanta viajar, conocer otras culturas y llenarme de aventuras y hacer nuevos amigos sobre todo recorrer el mundo viajando a través de esta maravillosa comunidad de Airbnb.
Por eso entiendo perfectamente lo que puedes estar pensando al momento de viajar, y me propongo apoyarte desde el mismo momento que decidas visitar nuestra hermosa ciudad.

Puedes relajarte y confiar que te daré los mejores datos de la ciudad, qué hacer y a dónde ir mientras estás en Santiago. Me puedes contactar en cualquier momento, estaré al tanto de tus inquietudes, consultas y comentarios!


¡Bienvenid@s a Santiago!

Daniela :)
